name: Goyarota
description:
Pretty sure there's no need to namedrop here, is there?    Goyarota fits snuggly between the once   popular fixed shooters which used  to rule the early arcades. Unlike those though it won't eat up your pocket money.

Take the lead against the evil alien army, who is invading    the once peaceful starsystem with flaming wrath.  Their seemingly infinite number of jelly soldiers may pose the biggest threat our small military has yet faced.

So stand up for yourself  and show 'em what you're made of.   
Will the aliens cease to be, or your corpse drift through space?

Featuring more than 80 stages with tricky suprises , so don't get comfortable using your old rythm to shoot the invaders down!

Power up your ship by using the enemy's attacks against them, though be careful , the more powerful you are, the more aggressive they get!

Show off your  perfect aim and reap the rewards for it!

A little bit to playing and controlling Goyarota. - The program supports both keyboard input as well as Xbox 360 and compatible controllers. Other third party controller admittedly won't work without some workaround. Just a heads up :) - Keyboard uses Space/Esc/Arrow Keys as input. - Esc pauses the game or quits the game. Holding down Esc when the game is paused quits the game. F3 toggles between Fullscreen/Window
